# The `OffloadEntriesInfoManager` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Enumerations

### enum  {#a2dc9d099b77ee3b8db3b00ad9273823d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>enum llvm::OffloadEntriesInfoManager::OMPTargetDeviceClauseKind : uint32&#95;t</>}>
Kind of device clause for declare target variables and functions NOTE: Currently not used as a part of a variable entry used for Flang and Clang to interface with the variable related registration functions.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a2dc9d099b77ee3b8db3b00ad9273823da168f6569c38da7979aa5e36d0a21b871" />
<EnumerationListItem name="OMPTargetDeviceClauseAny">
The target is marked for all devices (= 0x0)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a2dc9d099b77ee3b8db3b00ad9273823da0b01e5482bdaaeddc6a90686b1e99463" />
<EnumerationListItem name="OMPTargetDeviceClauseNoHost">
The target is marked for non-host devices (= 0x1)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a2dc9d099b77ee3b8db3b00ad9273823daf7d5c1f2266295444968655f5f3bd339" />
<EnumerationListItem name="OMPTargetDeviceClauseHost">
The target is marked for host devices (= 0x2)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a2dc9d099b77ee3b8db3b00ad9273823da830796e694a1ff7b17eff2d951c8f433" />
<EnumerationListItem name="OMPTargetDeviceClauseNone">
The target is marked as having no clause (= 0x3)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>
